Explanation: If not empty, random locations will only be created on indicated locations. Empty if all continents

Defines the cost type of the different feedstocks / economic assumptions at locations / in countries. Possible are:
'location': costs will be looked up for each location (from location_data)
'uniform': as set in techno_economic_data_conversion
['COUNTRY_NAME_1', 'COUNTRY_NAME_2', ...]: costs will be looked up for specific countries in list, for all other based on location data
'all_countries': always country (from country_data)
Comment: If location or country are used, values for locations and countries need to be available in location_data and country_data

Explanation: Indicates if low-temperature heat is available at start
Comment: Affects conversion costs; value defined in cost_type

Explanation: Indicates if medium-temperature heat is available at start
Comment: Affects conversion costs; value defined in cost_type

Explanation: Indicates if high-temperature heat is available at start
Comment: Affects conversion costs; value defined in cost_type

Explanation: Number of random locations to create
Sets minimal latitude of random locations
Comment: will be overwritten if minimal_example is applied

Explanation: Sets maximal latitude of random locations
Comment: will be overwritten if minimal_example is applied

Explanation: Sets minimal longitude of random locations
Comment: will be overwritten if minimal_example is applied

Explanation: Sets maximal longitude of random locations
